title: The state of online deals: smarter shoppers, much more information
text:
The state of online deals: smarter shoppers, much more information 12:00 a.m. Monday, Sept. 14, 2015 | Filed in: Technology ﻿ Story Highlights “Stacking” is a way people save money by combining a coupon, discounted gift card and cash-back credit card. Most shoppers now use mobile devices to start their search for deals and savings. Companies such as RetailMeNot and Offers.com work to aggregate and showcase the best online sales and deals. 
When did we get so cynical about online shopping deals? 
Perhaps I was paying too much attention to social media chatter on Amazon Prime Day, the completely made-up shopping holiday from the biggest online retailer. As I wrote back in July , it made the company a ton of money but also made a lot of Twitter people grumble about junky garage-sale-quality items and legit-good items that sold out too quickly.
